languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, this attack doesn't spend all of the wearer's MP.
Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack doesn't spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者单次攻击至少击杀两名敌人时，此次不会使装备者耗尽{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者单次攻击至少击杀两名敌人时，此次不会使装备者耗尽{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Когда персонаж убивает 2 или более врагов одной атакой, эта атака не обнуляет количество его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж убивает 2 или более врагов одной атакой, эта атака не обнуляет количество его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Когда персонаж убивает 2 или более врагов одной атакой, эта атака не обнуляет количество его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

languages.text: 一撃で2体以上の敵を倒すと、その攻撃での{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は消費されなくなる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 一撃で2体以上の敵を倒すと、その攻撃での{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は消費されなくなる。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador mata a 2 o más enemigos con un solo ataque, el ataque no gasta todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador mata a 2 o más enemigos con un solo ataque, el ataque no gasta todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger 2 oder mehr Feinde mit einem einzigen Angriff tötet, verbraucht der Angriff nicht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Trägers.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger 2 oder mehr Feinde mit einem einzigen Angriff tötet, verbraucht der Angriff nicht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Trägers.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine au moins 2 ennemis au cours de la même attaque, cette attaque ne lui coûte pas l'intégralité de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine au moins 2 ennemis au cours de la même attaque, cette attaque ne lui coûte pas l'intégralité de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
